biotools.summary: Designed to reliably detect recent positive selection in a varying size population, even if you only have polymorphism data from a single locus (i.e. a very short piece of DNA).

bioschemas.name: MFDM
bioschemas.summary: Designed to reliably detect recent positive selection in a varying size population, even if you only have polymorphism data from a single locus (i.e. a very short piece of DNA).
